nameEntry.part: University of Alberta. Department of Occupational Therapy

biogHist.p: Begun in 1960 as a 3-year diploma program, Occupational Therapy offered its first 4-year degree program in 1970 and masterþs program in 1982 within the Faculty of Rehabilitation Medicine. Besides providing professional training for undergraduates and graduates, it participates in continuing education, research, consultation and professional associations, as well as developing field work experience programs. Heads [1960]-1973 Leonard G. Allbon; 1973-1976 Benita Bradley Fifield; 1975-1976 Sharon G. Brintnell (Acting). Chairs: 1976-1979 Sharon G. Brintnell; 1979-1982 Helen M.
